description: Follow live text commentary, score updates and match stats from Tranmere Rovers vs Chesterfield in the League Two
title: Tranmere Rovers vs Chesterfield: League Two stats & head-to-head
title_page: Tranmere Rovers vs Chesterfield: League Two stats & head-to-head - BBC Sport
maintext:
Tranmere Rovers have won each of their last four home Football League games against Chesterfield, keeping a clean sheet in three of those victories.
Chesterfield have won each of their last two Football League games against Tranmere Rovers and could win three in succession for the first time since April 1985 in the EFL.
Tranmere have won each of their last two home league games and will be looking to win three in succession for the first time since March last year.
Chesterfield have won each of their last three away league games and will be looking to win four in succession on the road in the EFL for the first time since August 2014.
